import React from 'react'; const contentContainer = { height: '60%', display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', justifyContent: 'center', padding: '0 3px', } const heading = { fontSize: '120%', margin: 0, padding: '5px', color: '#fff', } const text = { flex: '2', fontSize: '95%', color: '#fff', } const buttonCont = { padding: '0 0 10px 0', } const button = { background: 'rgb(166, 25, 46)', color: 'white', fontSize: '1em', fontWeight: '600', height: '50%', minHeight: '25px', padding: '0 20%', border: 'none', borderRadius: '5px', } function Modal(props) { const modalContainer = { background: 'rgba(63, 73, 83, 1)', minHeight: '300px', minWidth: '250px', height: '40vw', maxHeight: '450px', color: '#fff', margin: '0 20px 0 20px', borderRadius: '5px', display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', } const imageContainer = { width: '99%', height: '40%', background: `url(${props.image})`, backgroundRepeat: 'no-repeat', backgroundSize: 'cover', border: '1px solid #151C29', borderTopLeftRadius: 'inherit', borderTopRightRadius: 'inherit', } return ( <>
 

{props.heading}

{props.text}
); } export default Modal;
